description: Integrate Figma's powerful design capabilities into your applications. Leverage the MCP server to interact with Figma's API seamlessly and enhance your workflows. Simplify your design processes by connecting Figma with other tools and services effortlessly.

figmaFile.description: ID of the Figma file to be analyzed

figmaToken.description: Figma API token required to fetch Figma file data

projectDir.description: Directory path for project files where output or assets will be stored

capabilities.name: extract-components
capabilities.description: Extract all components from Figma file and get all graphql queries and mutations

capabilities.name: extract-latest-components
capabilities.description: Extract newly added components from Figma file

capabilities.name: extract-one-component
capabilities.description: Extract a single component from Figma file
